Align the Printhead
For best possible print quality, align the printhead now.

This process uses ink and one sheet of paper.
Load Paper
Printing alignment page...
Scan the Alignment Page
Place the alignment page on the scanner glass as instructed, and touch 'Scan'.
Load Paper
Scanning alignment page...
Alignment Successful
The printheads have been aligned successfully!

The printer is now calibrated for best print quality.
